body.p: This section of the site contains a number of how-to documents aimed at contributors of all types. See the links in the menu on the left for more details.

A how to document describes how to perform a specific task. It is not intended to provide the reader with in-depth knowledge about that task, instead it provides a step-by-step guide describing how to perform the task. A good how to will point the reader at more detailed documentation wherever possible, thus allowing a reader to choose between understanding how to achieve a task and fully understanding why each step is required.
